data.persona: I am the blessed and favored.  I can do as I please, when I please.  I bask in his glory.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The temple is massive and beautiful. It was made for the king that is said to be of the gods. The decorations come from only the most luxurious vendors in the world. Inside the temple there are many ancient artifacts that are used in rituals. The decorations are made of gold and shiny things.
There's a things and an artifact here.
The king and the king's child are here.

You are carrying a kings seal.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the king's child, because it will make her happy.
data.mid_motivation: I want the child to be happy, so that the king will hire me to be his daughter's governess.
data.long_motivation: By month's end, I aim to be living a comfortable life in the castle.
